summary: Jun-oh, an insurance claims agent, faces off with a client who he suspects of committing murders with the intention of collecting insurance premiums.
cast: Su-han Choi|Choon-ha Hwang|Jung-min Hwang|In-gi Jeong|Kim Jeong-pal|Do-Yoon Kim|Seo-hyeong Kim|Yeong-Seon Kim|Kyung-Hoon Lee|Ji-young Moon|Kang Shin-il|Byung-wook Son|Ho-Seung Son|Seung-mok Yoo|Seon Yu
title: Geomeun jip
